channel.title: CVE Feed for brainstormforce -- Lightweight Sidebar Manager
channel.description: The latest CVEs for brainstormforce -- Lightweight Sidebar Manager

item.title: CVE-2020-36747|2024-08-04T17:37:06.945Z -- brainstormforce -- lightweight%20sidebar%20manager
item.description: The Lightweight Sidebar Manager plugin for WordPress is vulnerable to Cross-Site Request Forgery in versions up to, and including, 1.1.4. This is due to missing or incorrect nonce validation on the metabox_save() function. This makes it possible for unauthenticated attackers to save metbox data via a forged request granted they can trick a site administrator into performing an action such as clicking on a link.
